item.description:
It's an anything goes type of night - come out and enjoy it with the Newport Friends Group!

Jimmy's Saloon - Pool/Darts/Karaoke - Pub Night - Pre-Thanksgiving Fun! We plan to start a fun night at Jimmy's Saloon at 7:30PM, November 23, 2011. 

Karaoke usually starts at Jimmy's on Wednesdays at 9PM.

Food is not available at Jimmy's but they allow us to order take out/take in....
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up at back Pool Table/Dart Board area or call 401-559-3846 - Michael's cell.
item.name: Our 3rd year of Pre-Thanksgiving fun @ Jimmy's Saloon - Pool/Darts - Karaoke.
